predicate.note: Frames file for 'estimate' based on survey of initial sentences from big corpus

roleset.name: guess

example.name: transitive, arg1 as sentence
example.text: The department previously estimated that durable-goods orders fell 0.1%

example.name: passivized with arg2
example.text: Johnson & Johnson's profits from Retin-A are estimated *trace* at $50 million.

roleset.note:
extraction from passive: the Marunouchi holdings are estimated [*trace=Marunouchi holdings* to have a market value of 10 trillion Yen] rel [Arg1-PRD ] Note: "the Marunouchi holdings" will actually have no direct tagging
this in turn suggests that all the passive-extraction cases should be treated this way.
